### Invitation to Tender for Building 118 Exterior Repainting

---

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** 01B46-23-102
* **Publication Date:** 2023-08-16
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-01 T14:00:00 EST
* **Contracting Entity:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* **Procurement Category:** Services (Maintenance and Repair)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Project Description

The Central Experimental Farm, located at 960 Carling, Ottawa, requires a general contractor to perform the following works for the exterior of Building 118:

* Preparation and painting
* Repair of damaged wood

A non-mandatory site visit will be held on Wednesday, August 23, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. (EDT), to review the project site.

### Tender Requirements

* To participate, interested bidders must register on the [CanadaBuy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) platform.
* Tender documents, including addenda, will be available on the CanadaBuy platform.
* A mandatory requirements statement and Technical Specifications for the project are provided in the tender package.
* Bidders must adhere to the Canada Cost Mongo P er (MARP) guidelines.

### Evaluation Criteria

* The tender will be evaluated on the basis of Lowest Price (CPTA 47.001 g)(103)(an).
* All technical aspects of the tender will be evaluated as part of the price proposal.

### Additional Information

* AAFC reserves the right to accept any proposal in whole or in part, without prior negotiation, and to reject any or all proposals received.
* During the tender period, inquiries must be directed ONLY to the designated AAFC Contract Officer.
* Any bidder who contacts anyone other than the designated Contract Officer may be disqualified from the tender process.
